name: part_000
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら生誕祭2025】生誕3D LIVE！FEVER！！！！！！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [uB6GxHc7PRc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Title screen and health warning regarding intense flashing lights.
Intro animation sequence featuring Usada Pekora's silhouette and a storybook-style cartoon of her world.
Birthday 3D Live performance by Usada Pekora, singing 'Distance' on a stage with backup dancers.

subtitles.original:
※この配信は演出により激しく点滅する場面がございます
部屋を明るくし画面から十分離れてご視聴ください
subtitles.english:
*This broadcast contains scenes with intense flashing lights.
Please watch in a bright room and keep a safe distance from the screen.

subtitles.original: START!!
subtitles.english: START!!

subtitles.original: もう 振り向かず 歩いてゆけるさ
subtitles.english: I can walk on without looking back now

subtitles.original: いつか また逢う その日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day we meet again

subtitles.original: 君の 夢がきっと 叶うように
subtitles.english: I'm praying to that star

subtitles.original: あの星に願っているよ
subtitles.english: That your dreams will surely come true

subtitles.original: Distance -Special Full Version-
subtitles.english: Distance -Special Full Version-

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：Daito Music
subtitles.english: Lyrics & Composition: Daito Music

subtitles.original: もうすぐ 逢えなくなる 君の突然の言葉
subtitles.english: Soon we won't be able to meet, your sudden words

subtitles.original: 何も考えられず ただうつむいた
subtitles.english: I couldn't think of anything, I just looked down

subtitles.original: 夜も眠れずに 涙をこらえて
subtitles.english: Unable to sleep at night, holding back tears

subtitles.original: ずっと答えを探してた
subtitles.english: I was searching for an answer all along

subtitles.original: だけど本当に君が好きだから
subtitles.english: But because I truly love you

subtitles.original: 信じ続けたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep believing

subtitles.original: もう 振り向かず 歩いてゆけるさ
subtitles.english: I can walk on without looking back now

subtitles.original: いつか また逢う その日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day we meet again

subtitles.original: 君の 夢がきっと 叶うように
subtitles.english: I'm praying to that star

subtitles.original: あの星に願っているよ
subtitles.english: That your dreams will surely come true

subtitles.original: どんなに遠く 2人離れても
subtitles.english: No matter how far apart we are

subtitles.original: ずっと君を想っている
subtitles.english: I'll always be thinking of you

subtitles.original: この寂しさを 乗り越えられたら
subtitles.english: If I can overcome this loneliness

subtitles.original: きっと笑顔でまた逢える
subtitles.english: I'm sure we can meet again with a smile

subtitles.original: やがて時は流れて 何気ない毎日
subtitles.english: Time passed, and the ordinary days

subtitles.original: ただ穏やかな日々が 流れていった
subtitles.english: Just peacefully flowed by

subtitles.original: 遠く離れても 2人の写真は
subtitles.english: Even if we're far apart, the photo of us two

subtitles.original: いつも笑顔でいてくれる
subtitles.english: Always stays smiling

subtitles.original: 見知らぬ場所で君が輝くから
subtitles.english: Because you're shining in an unfamiliar place
